[
  {
    "scene_number": 1,
    "timestamp": "00:00 - 00:13",
    "time_sec": 0.0,
    "location": "Park at night",
    "visual_description": "A person in a dark shirt and shorts is walking a small white dog on a leash in a park at night. The lighting is dim, with some streetlights visible in the background. Trees are prominent in the scene. The person appears to be talking on a phone.",
    "characters": ["Man 1", "Dog"],
    "dialogue": "אה, אה, אה, אה,",
    "mood_tone": "Casual, conversational",
    "keywords": ["park", "night", "dog walking", "phone call", "outdoors"],
    "frame_path": "uploads/session_id/frames/frame_0001_t0.0s.jpg"
  },
  {
    "scene_number": 2,
    "timestamp": "00:13 - 00:32",
    "time_sec": 13.0,
    "location": "Park at night",
    "visual_description": "A man in a red t-shirt is standing in a park at night, talking on his phone. He has a beard and short hair. The background shows trees and dim lighting. He seems to be listening intently to the person on the other end of the call.",
    "characters": ["Man 1"],
    "dialogue": "כן. היי, עצקו, מה קורה אחי? ככה הרבה זמן לחזורה. כן, סורי, אולי, עם דברים על הראש. מה, על מרצי תלדבר? מה, אתה עם הכלבה עכשיו? כן, אני מרדן, הטיול על לי, את יודעת. על מרצי תלדבר? עצקו?",
    "mood_tone": "Casual, concerned",
    "keywords": ["park", "night", "phone call", "conversation", "friendship"],
    "frame_path": "uploads/session_id/frames/frame_0002_t13.0s.jpg"
  },
  {
    "scene_number": 3,
    "timestamp": "00:32 - 00:45",
    "time_sec": 32.0,
    "location": "Park at night",
    "visual_description": "A man in a red t-shirt is sitting down, looking distressed and talking on his phone. His expression is one of frustration and disappointment. The setting appears to be a park at night, with blurred lights in the background.",
    "characters": ["Man 1"],
    "dialogue": "אה, יצקו התנתקנו, אה, דבר איתי, ביי. תאה איזה, אני לא מדברת אותו. למה, מה קרה? אה, נשבר לי, אחי, כל פשוט נתקשר להם, הוא אומר, אני אחז
